statement.p: Out of the last 42 days, it rained 9 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{9}}{{42}}={0.21428571428571}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.21428571428571}={21.428571428571} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 21.43 .
